blocks.name: wallispilem1
blocks.content: ` I ` is monotone: increasing the exponent, the integral decreases. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm wallispilem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(c0, c1)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cn0, citg(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3brtr4d(cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(c0, c1), citg(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), citg(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, c1)), w0)
  itgle(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, c1), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), cibl), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(cpi, cr), wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cn0))
  iblioosinexp(s1, nat0, cpi, co(c1, caddc, nat1))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(cmpt(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, c1)), cibl), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(cpi, cr), wcel(c1, cn0))
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat0, cr))
  a1i(w0, wcel(cpi, cr))
  pire()
  iblioosinexp(s1, nat0, cpi, c1)
  reexpcld(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), co(c1, caddc, nat1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cn0))
  reexpcld(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi))))
  leexp2rd(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), co(c1, caddc, nat1), c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), wcel(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cr))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), wcel(c1, cn0))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfv(cuz, c1)))
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c1)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(c1, cz))
  nn0zd(c1, w0)
  uzid(c1)
  peano2uz(c1, c1)
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(csin, cv(s1))))
  sylc(wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(csin, cv(s1))), wa(wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cr)), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(csin, cv(s1))))
  jctil(wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cr))
  resincld(cv(s1), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)))
  0re()
  sinq12gt0(cv(s1))
  ltle(nat0, cfv(csin, cv(s1)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), wbr(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cle, nat1))
  simprd(wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), wbr(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cle, nat1), wbr(cneg(nat1), cle, cfv(csin, cv(s1))))
  syl(wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), wa(wbr(cneg(nat1), cle, cfv(csin, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cle, nat1)), wcel(cv(s1), cr))
  elioore(cv(s1), nat0, cpi)
  sinbnd(cv(s1))
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), citg(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cn0))
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cn0), wcel(c1, cn0))
  peano2nn0(c1)
  fvmpt(s0, co(c1, caddc, nat1), cn0, c0, citg(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), citg(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, cv(s0))))
  itgeq2dv(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, cv(s0)), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c1, caddc, nat1)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(s0), co(c1, caddc, nat1)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), wceq(co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, cv(s0)), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1))))
  oveq2(cv(s0), co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp)
  itgex(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), citg(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, c1))), wcel(c1, cn0))
  fvmpt(s0, c1, cn0, c0, citg(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, c1)), citg(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, cv(s0))))
  itgeq2dv(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, cv(s0)), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, c1), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  adantr(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), wceq(co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, cv(s0)), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, c1)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), c1, cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp)
  itgex(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, c1))
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cioo, cpi)
  diff.cioo.s(s1)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cpi.s(s1)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.citg.s(s0, s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))
  diff.co.s(s0, cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), co(c1, caddc, nat1))
  diff.co.s(s1, c1, caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.citg.s(s0, s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, c1))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cioo, cpi)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cioo.s(s0)
  diff.cpi.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, csin, cv(s1))
  diff.csin.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cexp.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm wallispilem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 `(c1[+]1))[≤](c0 ` c1))
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦ S.((0[(,)]π),((sin ` s1)[^]s0), s1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℕ0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3brtr4d((c0 `(c1[+]1)), cle, (c0 ` c1), S.((0[(,)]π),((sin ` s1)[^](c1[+]1)), s1), S.((0[(,)]π),((sin ` s1)[^]c1), s1), w0)
  itgle(s1, (0[(,)]π), ((sin ` s1)[^](c1[+]1)), ((sin ` s1)[^]c1), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (s1 ∈(0[(,)]π)↦((sin ` s1)[^](c1[+]1)))∈ L^1, 0 ∈ ℝ, π ∈ ℝ, (c1[+]1)∈ ℕ0)
  iblioosinexp(s1, nat0, cpi, (c1[+]1))
  syl3anc(w0, (s1 ∈(0[(,)]π)↦((sin ` s1)[^]c1))∈ L^1, 0 ∈ ℝ, π ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℕ0)
  a1i(w0, 0 ∈ ℝ)
  a1i(w0, π ∈ ℝ)
  pire()
  iblioosinexp(s1, nat0, cpi, c1)
  reexpcld((sin ` s1), (c1[+]1), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈(0[(,)]π)))
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈(0[(,)]π), (c1[+]1)∈ ℕ0)
  reexpcld((sin ` s1), c1, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈(0[(,)]π)))
  leexp2rd((sin ` s1), (c1[+]1), c1, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈(0[(,)]π)))
  adantl(w0, s1 ∈(0[(,)]π), (sin ` s1)∈ ℝ)
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈(0[(,)]π), c1 ∈ ℕ0)
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈(0[(,)]π), (c1[+]1)∈(ℤ≥ ` c1))
  syl(w0, (c1[+]1)∈(ℤ≥ ` c1), c1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1))
  syl(w0, c1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1), c1 ∈ ℤ)
  nn0zd(c1, w0)
  uzid(c1)
  peano2uz(c1, c1)
  adantl(w0, s1 ∈(0[(,)]π), 0[≤](sin ` s1))
  sylc(s1 ∈(0[(,)]π), 0[≤](sin ` s1), (0 ∈ ℝ ∧(sin ` s1)∈ ℝ), 0[<](sin ` s1))
  jctil(s1 ∈(0[(,)]π), 0 ∈ ℝ, (sin ` s1)∈ ℝ)
  resincld(s1, s1 ∈(0[(,)]π))
  0re()
  sinq12gt0(s1)
  ltle(nat0, (sin ` s1))
  adantl(w0, s1 ∈(0[(,)]π), (sin ` s1)[≤]1)
  simprd(s1 ∈(0[(,)]π), (sin ` s1)[≤]1, -u(1)[≤](sin ` s1))
  syl(s1 ∈(0[(,)]π), (-u(1)[≤](sin ` s1)∧(sin ` s1)[≤]1), s1 ∈ ℝ)
  elioore(s1, nat0, cpi)
  sinbnd(s1)
  syl(w0, (c0 `(c1[+]1))= S.((0[(,)]π),((sin ` s1)[^](c1[+]1)), s1), (c1[+]1)∈ ℕ0)
  syl(w0, (c1[+]1)∈ ℕ0, c1 ∈ ℕ0)
  peano2nn0(c1)
  fvmpt(s0, (c1[+]1), cn0, c0, S.((0[(,)]π),((sin ` s1)[^](c1[+]1)), s1), S.((0[(,)]π),((sin ` s1)[^]s0), s1))
  itgeq2dv(s1, (0[(,)]π), ((sin ` s1)[^]s0), ((sin ` s1)[^](c1[+]1)), s0 =(c1[+]1))
  adantr(s0 =(c1[+]1), s1 ∈(0[(,)]π), ((sin ` s1)[^]s0)=((sin ` s1)[^](c1[+]1)))
  oveq2(s0, (c1[+]1), (sin ` s1), cexp)
  itgex(s1, (0[(,)]π), ((sin ` s1)[^](c1[+]1)))
  syl(w0, (c0 ` c1)= S.((0[(,)]π),((sin ` s1)[^]c1), s1), c1 ∈ ℕ0)
  fvmpt(s0, c1, cn0, c0, S.((0[(,)]π),((sin ` s1)[^]c1), s1), S.((0[(,)]π),((sin ` s1)[^]s0), s1))
  itgeq2dv(s1, (0[(,)]π), ((sin ` s1)[^]s0), ((sin ` s1)[^]c1), s0 = c1)
  adantr(s0 = c1, s1 ∈(0[(,)]π), ((sin ` s1)[^]s0)=((sin ` s1)[^]c1))
  oveq2(s0, c1, (sin ` s1), cexp)
  itgex(s1, (0[(,)]π), ((sin ` s1)[^]c1))
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cioo, cpi)
  diff.cioo.s(s1)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cpi.s(s1)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.citg.s(s0, s1, (0[(,)]π), ((sin ` s1)[^](c1[+]1)))
  diff.co.s(s0, (sin ` s1), cexp, (c1[+]1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, (c1[+]1))
  diff.co.s(s1, c1, caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.citg.s(s0, s1, (0[(,)]π), ((sin ` s1)[^]c1))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cioo, cpi)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cioo.s(s0)
  diff.cpi.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, (sin ` s1), cexp, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, csin, s1)
  diff.csin.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cexp.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: wallispilem2
blocks.content: A first set of properties for the sequence ` I ` that will be used in the proof of the Wallis product formula. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm wallispilem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- w3a(wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cpi), wceq(cfv(c0, nat1), nat2), wi(wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), co(co(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cdiv, c1), cmul, cfv(c0, co(c1, cmin, nat2))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cn0, citg(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  3pm3.2i(wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cpi), wceq(cfv(c0, nat1), nat2), wi(wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), co(co(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cdiv, c1), cmul, cfv(c0, co(c1, cmin, nat2))))))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cpi), wcel(nat0, cn0))
  0nn0()
  fvmpt(s0, nat0, cn0, c0, cpi, citg(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, cv(s0))))
  syl6eq(citg(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, cv(s0))), cpi, citg(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), nat1), wceq(cv(s0), nat0))
  itgeq2dv(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, cv(s0)), nat1, wceq(cv(s0), nat0))
  eqtrd(co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, cv(s0)), nat1, co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, nat0), wa(wceq(cv(s0), nat0), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi))))
  adantr(wceq(cv(s0), nat0), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), wceq(co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, cv(s0)), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, nat0)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), nat0, cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp)
  exp0d(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), nat0), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi))))
  adantl(wceq(cv(s0), nat0), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), wcel(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cc))
  eqtri(citg(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), nat1), cpi, co(nat1, cmul, cfv(cvol, co(nat0, cioo, cpi))))
  mp3an(wceq(citg(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), nat1), co(nat1, cmul, cfv(cvol, co(nat0, cioo, cpi)))), wcel(co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cfv(cvol, co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), cr), wcel(nat1, cc))
  ioombl(nat0, cpi)
  ax-1cn()
  itgconst(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), nat1)
  eqtri(co(nat1, cmul, cfv(cvol, co(nat0, cioo, cpi))), cpi, cfv(cvol, co(nat0, cioo, cpi)))
  mulid2i(cfv(cvol, co(nat0, cioo, cpi)))
  recni(cfv(cvol, co(nat0, cioo, cpi)))
  mp2an(wcel(cfv(cvol, co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), cr), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(cpi, cr))
  ioovolcl(nat0, cpi)
  eqtri(cfv(cvol, co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), cpi, co(cpi, cmin, nat0))
  mp3an(wceq(cfv(cvol, co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), co(cpi, cmin, nat0)), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(cpi, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, cpi))
  ltleii(nat0, cpi)
  0re()
  pipos()
  volioo(nat0, cpi)
  subid1i(cpi)
  recni(cpi)
  elexi(cpi, cr)
  pire()
  eqtri(cfv(c0, nat1), nat2, citg(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s1))))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(c0, nat1), citg(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s1)))), wcel(nat1, cn0))
  1nn0()
  fvmpt(s0, nat1, cn0, c0, citg(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s1))), citg(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, cv(s0))))
  itgeq2dv(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, cv(s0)), cfv(csin, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), nat1))
  eqtrd(co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, cv(s0)), cfv(csin, cv(s1)), co(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, nat1), wa(wceq(cv(s0), nat1), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi))))
  oveq2d(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cexp, cv(s0), nat1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), nat1), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi))))
  simpl(wceq(cv(s0), nat1), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)))
  exp1d(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), nat1), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi))))
  adantl(wceq(cv(s0), nat1), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)), wcel(cfv(csin, cv(s1)), cc))
  sincld(cv(s1), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi)))
  sseli(cv(s1), co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cc)
  ioosscn(nat0, cpi)
  itgex(s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s1)))
  itgsin0pi(s1)
  itgsinexp(s0, s1, c0, c1, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  id(wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), nat0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cioo, cpi)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cioo.s(s1)
  diff.cpi.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.citg.s(s0, s1, co(nat0, cioo, cpi), cfv(csin, cv(s1)))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cioo, cpi)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cioo.s(s0)
  diff.cpi.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, csin, cv(s1))
  diff.csin.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cfv(cuz, nat2))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, nat2)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c1, cfv(cuz, nat2))

blocks.name: wallispi
blocks.content: Wallis' formula for π : Wallis' product converges to π / 2 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)

blocks.name: wallispi2lem2
blocks.content: Two expressions are proven to be equal, and this is used to complete the proof of the second version of Wallis' formula for π . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 30-Jun-2017.)

blocks.name: wallispi2
blocks.content: An alternative version of Wallis' formula for π ; this second formula uses factorials and it is later used to prove Stirling's approximation formula. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
